cocktails.name: Vodka Redbull
cocktails.recipe: Pour 2 shots of vodka in a glass full of ice. Top with Redbull

cocktails.name: Mimosa
cocktails.recipe: Mix equal parts into champagne flute

cocktails.name: Captain and Coke
cocktails.recipe: Fill glass with ice, add 2 ounces of Captain Morgan Rum. Fill the rest of the glass with Coke and stir.
